topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e68acc636872567e4f0100#post_53e68acc636872567e4f0100
Honestly my guess of how this is going to turn out is that ISIS will ten years down the line have their own areas be their own little country, to which the rest of the world will nickname "1st place shithole of the world"; western Syria will still have Assad in power, to which the rest of the world will nickname "2nd place shithole of the world".

The northwest part of Iraq has for the last decade been the shithole of the country and the most dangerous part; there's no way Iraq is getting that part back considering that they haven't been able to control it anyhow.
